k-means analysis on normalized Histone-residue Position Modification
========================================================

```{r}
library(stats)
data<-read.table(file="G:/mihaela/Matrix_forKclusterSpc_0.txt")


dim(data)
head(data)
km<-kmeans(data,8,iter.max=50000,nstart=10000,algorithm=c("Hartigan-Wong"))
km
m2<-cbind(data,km$cluster)
library(cluster)
dissE <- daisy(data,metric="euclidean")
sk<-silhouette(km$cl,dissE)
plot(sk,col=c("dark blue"))
dE2 <- dissE^2
sk2 <- silhouette(km$cl, dE2)
plot(sk2,col=c("dark blue"))

clusplot(data, km$cluster, color=TRUE, shade=TRUE, 
         labels=2, lines=0)
```
